meanings.definition: A tool used for smoothing or shaping wood.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used a planer to make the wooden board smooth.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new planer for my woodworking projects.
meanings.sent3: The planer decided to take a break after working hard all day.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a planer, smoothing out the rough edges of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The planer hummed as it glided effortlessly over the surface of the wood.

meanings.definition: A person or machine that planes.
meanings.sent1: The skilled planer knew exactly how to achieve a perfect finish.
meanings.sent2: The factory invested in a new planer to increase production efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The planer robot entertained the children with its smooth dance moves.
meanings.sent4: She was a planer in the world of woodworking, shaping raw materials into beautiful creations.
meanings.sent5: The planer worked tirelessly, never stopping until the job was done.
